definition: wind vane/anemometer/weathercock/fig. person who switches allegiance readily/turncoat

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: The research results of the Data Sampling and Processing System for the Gill UVW Anemometer are reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告三向风标数据采集及处理系统的研究成果。

sentences.english: Those qualities will stand it in as good a stead in the current century as they did in the last.
sentences.chinese: 这些特质将使这座城市延续其上个世纪的风标。

definition: standing above the common crowd (idiom); outstanding/excellent and unrivaled
to dance/to float in the wind
variant of 風采|风采[feng1 cai3]
lowering and raising of the head/(fig.) small move/pitch (position angle)
